trait.name: Like Calls To Like
text: The hallowed reed knows if a creature within 30 feet of it is good-aligned or not.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
text: Using telepathy, a hallowed reed can magically communicate with any other good-aligned creature within 100 feet of it. This communication is primarily through images and emotions rather than actual words.

trait.name: Rebirth
text: If a hallowed reed is slain, a new patch of hallowed reeds will grow in the same spot starting within a week of its death.
charring or salting the ground where a hallowed reed was slain prevents this resurgence.

action.name: Searing Grasp
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) radiant damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, it takes 2 (1d4) radiant damage at the start of each of its turns, and the hallowed reed can't grasp another target.
Undead and fiends have disadvantage on ability checks made to escape the grapple.
